snippet: Motif Investing, a firm based in a San Mateo, Calif., announced on Friday that it had raised a $25 million round of financing from investors including Goldman Sachs.
abstract: Motif Investing, a firm based in a San Mateo, Calif., announced on Friday that it had raised a $25 million round of financing from investors including Goldman Sachs.

headline.main: Goldman Invests in Upstart Online Broker
